attractions.name: The Ridge
attractions.description: Large open space in the heart of Shimla with panoramic views of the surrounding mountains.

attractions.name: Jakhu Temple
attractions.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Lord Hanuman with a 108-feet tall statue.

attractions.name: Mall Road
attractions.description: The main street of Shimla with shops, restaurants, and colonial buildings.

foodRecommendations.name: Madra
foodRecommendations.description: Traditional Himachali dish made with chickpeas cooked in yogurt gravy.

foodRecommendations.name: Sidu
foodRecommendations.description: A type of bread stuffed with poppy seeds, served with ghee.

activities.name: Heritage Walk
activities.description: Explore colonial architecture and historical buildings around Mall Road and The Ridge.

activities.name: Toy Train Ride
activities.description: Experience the UNESCO World Heritage Kalka-Shimla railway journey.

weatherAlert.description: Moderate to heavy rainfall expected in the afternoon. Plan indoor activities or carry rain gear.

roadAlerts.description: Road open from 8 AM to 4 PM. Permit required for vehicles.

attractions.name: Rohtang Pass
attractions.description: High mountain pass with snow-capped peaks and breathtaking views.

attractions.name: Solang Valley
attractions.description: Adventure sports hub with paragliding, zorbing, and skiing in winter.

attractions.name: Hidimba Devi Temple
attractions.description: Ancient wooden temple dedicated to Hidimba Devi in a cedar forest.

foodRecommendations.name: Trout Fish
foodRecommendations.description: Freshwater fish found in the rivers of Himachal, usually grilled or fried.

foodRecommendations.name: Tudkiya Bhath
foodRecommendations.description: Traditional rice dish cooked with lentils and aromatic spices.

activities.name: River Rafting
activities.description: Experience white water rafting in the rapids of Beas River.

activities.name: Paragliding
activities.description: Soar through the sky with a tandem paragliding experience in Solang Valley.

activities.name: Vashisht Hot Springs
activities.description: Relax in the natural hot water springs with therapeutic minerals.

attractions.name: Mcleodganj
attractions.description: Little Lhasa of India and home to the Dalai Lama and Tibetan government in exile.

attractions.name: Bhagsu Waterfall
attractions.description: Beautiful waterfall near Mcleodganj with a small cafe at the base.

attractions.name: Namgyal Monastery
attractions.description: Personal monastery of the Dalai Lama with Tibetan architecture and art.

foodRecommendations.name: Tibetan Momos
foodRecommendations.description: Steamed dumplings filled with vegetables or meat, served with spicy chutney.

foodRecommendations.name: Thukpa
foodRecommendations.description: Tibetan noodle soup with vegetables or meat, perfect for cold weather.

activities.name: Meditation Class
activities.description: Learn meditation techniques from Tibetan Buddhist monks.

activities.name: Triund Trek
activities.description: Popular day trek offering stunning views of the Dhauladhar range.
